title: Niecy Nash
description:
This week on Comedy Gold Minds, Kevin Hart is joined by comedian and actress Niecy Nash. The pair have an in-depth conversation about Nash’s start in comedy, breaking into the world of TV and Film, the advice she received from Bernie Mac while working on his show, and how her brother’s murder affected her at a young age.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart's Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Niecy Nash)
